reviewText: I saw this a long time ago and am so sad to see it disappear. Many life lessons to learn from it.  I hope they transfer it to DVD someday!

I loved this movie! I saw it 30 or more years ago on The Disney Channel. I recorded it with my VCR and loaned it to a family member and have never seen it again! I have looked on line for it off and on since then and also looked to see if it was scheduled to be on TV. I would love to find it on DVD or get it recorded on DVR. GREAT FILM!

It was an excellent movie that teaches the importance of family and how we spend most of our time rushing through life with our eyes closed.  It encourages you to put your values on what matters most!
